Register in the tracker manager a tracker.

Parameters:
tracker the tracker to register
Returns:
the id of the tracker

static GenericTracker* osgART::TrackerManager::createTrackerFromPlugin (  const std::string &  plugin  )  [static]
 

Parameters:
plugin name of the plugin (excluding the system specific extension)
Returns:
pointer to the instance of the tracker
Note:
This function works for release and debug mode and will add the 'd' letter at the end of the plugin name when required.

static TrackerManager* osgART::TrackerManager::getInstance (  bool  erase = false  )  [static]
 

Based on a singleton pattern, user can get the instance of the tracker manager actually used by the program.

Parameters:
erase explicitly deletes the singleton instance of the tracker manager
Returns:
an instance of a tracker manager or 0 if the tracker manager got erased

GenericTracker* osgART::TrackerManager::getTracker (  int  idTracker  ) 
 

Return instance of a tracker identified by his id.

Returns:
an instance of a tracker
